thread.title: Celebrities at London Fashion Week AW17
thread.title_full: Celebrities at London Fashion Week AW17

title: Celebrities at London Fashion Week AW17
text:
Iskra Lawrence 
Iskra Lawrence attended the Teatum Jones fashion show on Friday morning, wearing a colourful floral long-sleeved dress from Finery London. The model styled the dress with a black waist belt, mules and a baby pink handbag from Pop and Suki – the accessories line created by Poppy Jamie and Suki Waterhouse. Photo: © Getty Images 
Ella Eyre 
Ella Eyre turned heads on the Teatum Jones front row in this mustard sheer blouse and co-ordinating wide leg trousers from Gabriel Vielma. The If I Go singer teamed her statement look with a zebra print boxy clutch bag and round sunglasses, and shared a photo of herself on Instagram after the show, telling fans: "1 down 1 million to go #LFW." Photo: © Getty Images 
Georgia May Foote 
Strictly Come Dancing star Georgia May Foote dared to bare in a sheer red skirt from Teatum Jones' SS17 collection at the brand's show on Friday morning. The actress teamed the eye-catching maxi skirt with a red polo neck and black patent heels for her front row appearance, where she sat alongside Charlotte de Carle, Ella Eyre and Iskra Lawrence. Photo: © Getty Images 
Poppy Jamie 
Poppy Jamie was among the stars on the front row at the Teatum Jones fashion show. The TV presenter looked smart in a black top and tailored trousers, teamed with a statement checked and lace embellished blazer and court shoes. A handbag from her Pop and Suki accessories line complete the look. Photo: © Getty Images 
Tallia Storm 
Scottish singer Tallia Storm rocked a sports-luxe vibe on the front row at Eudon Choi's presentation on Friday morning. The 18-year-old wowed in a metallic silver bomber jacket and white bodysuit, paired with sporty split side trousers and trainers. "First show of the day @LondonFashionWk @eudonchoi #LFW," she captioned a photo of herself arriving for the show. Photo: © Getty Images 
Day 2 
Ellie Goulding and Will.I.Am 
It was quite the meeting of musical minds as Ellie Goulding and Will.I.Am sat front row to take in the Versus Versace show on Saturday. The pair both kept it simple in black ensembles. 
Lottie Moss 
Also at the Versus Versace show was Lottie Moss, Kate Moss' half-sister. The 19-year-old looked stunning as she showed the power of a little black dress. 
Kate Bosworth 
Known for her fashion prowess, it's no surprise Hollywood actress flew to London for the British capital's fashion week. Kate's first stop was the House of Holland show., sporting an unusual striped shirt dress. 
Day 3 
Daisy Lowe 
Attending the Roland Mouret show on Sunday morning, model Daisy Lowe looked stunning in a monochrome ensemble. 
American star Olivia Palermo never misses London Fashion Week. 
Henry Holland and Pixie Geldof 
The day after his successful fashion show, Henry Holland took a back seat as he attended the Topshop Unique show with his friend Pixie Geldof.
